📘 Total Courses ({{ totalCourses }})

Below are the types of courses currently available on the platform:

  • {{ type.name }} ({{ type.count }})
✅ Active Courses ({{ activeCourses }})

These are the courses currently available and open for student enrollment.

⏳ Pending Approvals ({{ pendingApprovals }})

Courses awaiting review and admin approval before being published.

🏷️ Categories ({{ categories }})

Courses are grouped into key learning categories to help users browse efficiently.

👨‍🎓 Enrollments ({{ enrollments }})

Total number of students enrolled across all courses.

📝 Course Reviews ({{ courseReviews }})

Feedback and ratings provided by students after completing the courses.
